DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study see whether patient undergo ESWL , upper tract urinary stone 1.5-2.0cm , may treat expulsion therapy ( Tamsulosin ) instead insert ureteral stent .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Patients After ESWL Treated With Ureteral Stents Versus Expulsion Therapy With Tamsulosin
DOC.criteria: Patients 18 yrs age . Single urolithiasis 2 cm . Kidney/ureters n't undergone previous ESWL stent insertion . Normal renal function ( creatinine 100mmo1/1 ) . Sterile urine culture . Normal CBC , blood electrolyte coagulation study . Radioopaque stone . More one stone per kidney unit . Patients receive steroid , NSAIDS , calcium channel blocker alpha blocker regular basis . Anatomical anomaly uromechanical obstruction . Single kidney . Cystinuria . Soldiers pregnant woman . Patients 18 year
